description.raw:
The following pull request demonstrates a benchmark test in ign-physics:

https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/84/simple-port-of-existing-performance-test/diff

It fails with only the stable repos:

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=278)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/278/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/278/

but it passes with this branch, using the nightly repos

[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=279)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/279/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/279/
description.html:
The following pull request demonstrates a benchmark test in ign-physics:

https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/pull-requests/84/simple-port-of-existing-performance-test/diff

It fails with only the stable repos:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/278/

but it passes with this branch, using the nightly repos

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/279/
